item.title: Report X-2025020314
item.description:
Report X-2025020314

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY TEN POUNDS OF DRY ICE BLOCKS COOLING CHOCOLATE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.description:
Report X-2025020122

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-28
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PICKOFF NOTICED WET HAZMAT AND STOPPED PROGRESS, LEFT AREA AND NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. SUPERVISOR CALLED RESPONDER WHO RESPONDED IN FULL PPE WITH DECISION TREE. FOLLOWING PROPER RESPONSE SHEET PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
